detail_desc: Long T-shirt in hard-washed slub cotton jersey with raw, roll edges and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Longer at the back.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front. The cotton content of the shorts is organic.

Baby Exclusive. Sleeveless romper suit in batik-patterned slub cotton jersey with buttons at the top. Side pockets, concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Fully lined bikini top with triangular cups, removable inserts, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and ties at the back.

Short, 5-pocket skirt with a high waist and zip fly in washed, stretch denim with a soft finish. Embrace – denim with a smart stretch function that moulds to the body for a comfortable, flattering silhouette.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, low crotch, side and back pockets and raw-edge hems.
Lace bra with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Flared tulle skirt with a flock print, elastication with a flock print at the waist and an asymmetric hem. Lined.
T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders and a straight hem.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif.

Short lace dress with a concealed zip at the back and long, slightly wider sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs. Fitted at the top, a seam at the waist and a wide, circular skirt. Lined.
Hat in paper straw with a contrasting colour trim around the brim. Width of brim 16 cm.
Sleeveless top in satin with a lace section at the top and a V-neck front and back.

Set with a T-shirt and shorts in cotton. T-shirt in jersey with a print motif. Knee-length, 5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist and a zip fly and press-stud.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Flip-flops with rubber straps, a print motif and fluted rubber soles.
Long-sleeved nightshirt in a soft cotton weave with buttons down the front, a chest pocket and a rounded hem.
Hat in a soft cable knit with a large faux fur pompom on top and a turn-up with a small appliqué at the hem.

Trousers in a slightly stretchy weave made from a wool blend with an elasticated waist and fake fly. Diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets, and gently tapered legs with sewn-in creases down the front.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in soft, stretch denim with hard-worn details with patches on the inside. Adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud and narrow hems.
Fully lined, off-the-shoulder swimsuit with elasticated, gathered frills at the top.

Sleeveless playsuit in an airy cotton weave with embroidery. Frill-trimmed shoulder straps, a V-neck with a tie detail and cut-out section at the front and a concealed zip at the back. Seam at the waist with pleats and diagonal side pockets. Scallop edges at the shoulder straps and hem. Lined.
Short coat in woven fabric with no buttons. Side pockets with decorative flaps, and a detachable belt with D-rings at the waist. Lined.
Wide trousers in ribbed jersey with a regular, elasticated, drawstring waist. The cotton content of the trousers is organic.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Cardigan in quilted jersey with a zip down the front, small stand-up collar with a press-stud, welt front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Soft jersey nursing bras with opening, lined cups with space for nursing pads, elastication under the bust and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
T-shirt in cotton jersey and joggers in sweatshirt fabric. T-shirt with a print motif. Joggers with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Narrow metal rings in various designs.
Trousers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Slim fit.
Shorts in soft, washed cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and a welt back pocket.
Jersey jumpsuit with a V-neck, short sleeves, narrow elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and tapered legs.
5-pocket trousers in stretch twill with a regular waist and slim legs.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Padded, detachable hood with an elastic drawstring and a fleece-lined stand-up collar. Zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front. Handwarmer pockets with snow flaps, patch pockets with a flap and hook and loop fastening, and one inner pocket. Inner ribbing at the cuffs and a concealed, elastic drawstring at the hem. Lined.
Ankle boots with pointed toes, covered heels and a zip in one side. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 8 cm.
Polo shirt in fine-knit premium cotton with a ribbed collar, button placket and ribbed trims around the sleeves and hem.
Imitation leather purse with a zip at the top that continues down the short sides. Eight card slots, two note compartments and a zipped coin compartment. Lined. Size 2x10x20 cm.
Captain’s cap in velour with covered elastication at the back. Lined.
Long-sleeved tops in soft jersey. The cotton content of the tops is organic.
Espadrilles in a cotton weave with a braided jute trim around the soles, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and fluted soles.
T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey with a small embroidery detail on the chest.
Knee-length, pleated skirt in an airy weave containing glittery threads with an elasticated waist. Satin lining.
Off-the-shoulder jumpsuit in a soft viscose weave with elastication and a wide flounce at the top, an elasticated seam at the waist and side pockets.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist, wide foldover edge at the top, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.
Jumper in a soft, fluffy knit with decorative sequins at the top, gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem and short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.

ANNA GLOVER x H&M. Top in patterned jersey with a small stand-up collar, V-neck with pleats at the front and gathered yoke at the back. Decorative gathers at the shoulders and long balloon sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.
Metal stud earrings in various sizes and designs. Size from 0.3 cm to 0.6 cm.

Checked Oxford cotton shirt with a button-down collar, open chest pocket and yoke with a hanger loop at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and narrow hems.
5-pocket, knee-length skirt in washed denim with worn details, a button fly and raw-edge hem.

Blouse in stretch, textured jersey with concealed elastication around the neckline and a V-shaped opening at the front with braided ties at the top. Long balloon sleeves with elasticated cuffs and elastication with frill trims at the hem.
Cardigan in a soft, textured-knit cotton blend with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and concealed pockets in the side seams. No buttons.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a text print on the front and sleeves and a press-stud on one shoulder.
Leggings in imitation leather. High waist with concealed elastication and legs with sewn-in creases at the front and raw-edge hems.
Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and rounded hem. Contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand.
Vest tops in soft, organic cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and armholes.
Fitted top in ribbed jersey with long puff sleeves in airy organza and a straight hem. Ribbing at the neckline and cuffs.

Patterned, padded all-in-one suit with a padded, pile-lined hood with ears on the top. Two zips down the front which continue down the legs, long raglan sleeves, elastication at the back and elastication with foldover ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Boxer briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Short cold shoulder dress in a crêpe weave with narrow adjustable shoulder straps and 3/4-length sleeves. Smocking at the waist and flounces at the cuffs and hem.

Short dress that is wide at the top and tapers at the waist to create a dramatic silhouette. Concealed zip at the back, visible seams, long dolman sleeves and a seam with a wide flounce for added width at the hem.
Flared top in soft jersey with an elasticated neckline and flounce at the top that continues across the shoulders. Overlocked edges.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Trousers woven in a wool blend containing some silk with a high waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket. Wide, tapered legs with creases and wide turn-ups at the hems.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with a ribbed shaft and elastication around the top.
Fine-knit sports socks in a soft cotton blend with a ribbed shaft.
Hat in a soft, fine knit with a pompom containing glittery threads on top and earflaps. Fleece lining.
Short, fitted T-shirt in cotton jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline.
Sleeveless romper suits in soft, organic cotton jersey with short legs and press-studs at the top and crotch.
Short top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Leggings in washed, stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake fly and back pockets.
Cropped top in jersey with long sleeves, a ribbed neckline and raw-edge, rolled hem.
Shirt in softly draping matt silk with a collar and buttons down the front. Yoke with a pleat at the back, wide, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Short-sleeved cotton jersey top in a relaxed fit with a slightly wider neckline and a rounded hem.
Briefs in soft microfibre designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin. Low waist, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a stand-up collar, detachable, lined hood with a faux fur trim, and zip down the front with a chin guard. Handwarmer pockets at the top, fake front pockets with a decorative flap, a drawstring at the waist, and a single back vent. Faux shearling lining at the top and a quilted lining made from recycled polyester below. The padding is made from recycled polyester.
Vest top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Satin-covered metal Alice band with large spotted-mesh ears and a spotted veil at the front.
Cardigan in soft, ribbed jersey with a small stand-up collar, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fancy dress costume in soft velour. Hood with embroidered details and appliqués, and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
